# privx_api_target (Data Source)

Lookup an existing PrivX API target (API-Proxy).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "privx_api_target" "my_api_target" {
  name = "my-api-target"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) ID of the API target. Set exactly one of `id` or `name`.
- `name` (String) Name of the API target. Set exactly one of `id` or `name`.

### Read-Only

- `access_group_id` (String)
- `audit_enabled` (Boolean)
- `author` (String)
- `authorized_endpoints` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--authorized_endpoints))
- `comment` (String)
- `created` (String)
- `disabled` (String)
- `roles` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roles))
- `tags` (Set of String)
- `target_credential` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--target_credential))
- `tls_insecure_skip_verify` (Boolean)
- `tls_trust_anchors` (String, Sensitive)
- `unauthorized_endpoints` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--unauthorized_endpoints))
- `updated` (String)
- `updated_by` (String)

### Nested Schema for `authorized_endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `allow_unauthenticated` (Boolean)
- `host` (String)
- `methods` (Set of String)
- `nat_target_host` (String)
- `paths` (Set of String)
- `protocols` (Set of String)

### Nested Schema for `roles`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)

### Nested Schema for `target_credential`

Read-Only:

- `basic_auth_password` (String, Sensitive)
- `basic_auth_username` (String)
- `bearer_token` (String, Sensitive)
- `certificate` (String, Sensitive)
- `private_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `type` (String)
